Hi all, have just recently joined the group & thought I=92d introduce mysel=
f.

I=92m Davy Smith, working towards a PhD that is focussing on the develo=
pment of curious NPCs in open world games by using intrinsically motivated =
values systems. My current project is looking at the effect of novelty sear=
ch with multiple behavioural definitions to agents in the video game Astero=
ids.

If not already listed - I=92d like to suggest this book, which gives =
a good overview of the various models of intrinsic motivation (including Sc=
hmidhuber and Oudeyer), which, as previously noted, do differ from novelty =
search, but are definitely related:

http://link.springer.com/book/10.1007%=
2F978-3-642-32375-1

thanks,

Davy 
--Apple-Mail=_8D768A3D-02BB-4810-9160-BB27DA5D31D1
